Title:
Carbinea, a new spider genus from North Queensland, Australia
(Araneae, Amaurobioidea, Kababininae).
Abstract:
The distribution of four species of Carbinea new genus in
the Wet Tropics region of northern Queensland documents the speciesâ€™
richness and local endemism. The new species are C. longiscapa, C.
breviscapa, C. wunderlichi and C. robertsi. They are placed in the
sub-family Kababininae which is removed frorn the Amphinectidae (Davies
1995) as there is evidence that it does not belong there. The placement
of this clade rernains problematical.
